programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Binti

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: Cloud Under The Roof
programme.desc: Paul, Julia, and Lilly are a happy family, until Julia dies unexpectedly. For the sake of his daughter, Paul wants to function and suppress his grief. Lilly keeps challenging him with her imagination and her very own view of Mum's death.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: A Little Bit Of Freedom
programme.desc: Haunted by a missing boy's case from 14 years ago, Helen Dorn recently discovers a lead linking to the alleged perpetrator, Ron Faber. Dorn immediately heads for Hamburg when she learns that Faber was apprehended with a deceased Chinese boy in his van.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Electric Wongaloo
programme.desc: In an attempt to revitalize his love life after the passing of his wife, Albert is thrust into the modern dating scene. Is he ready to move on from the past?

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mother’s suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Vera Dreams of the Sea
programme.desc: Vera, a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother, has her serene life turned upside down by her husband's sudden suicide. As greedy relatives and an underworld scheme threaten their family’s home, she must confront danger and take control of her own fate.
